string.name: duck_chat_contextual_onboarding_title
string.instruction: Title for contextual Duck AI onboarding sheet

string.name: duck_chat_contextual_onboarding_body
string.instruction: Body text for contextual Duck AI onboarding sheet

resources.string: Duck.ai can now help answer questions about the page you\'re viewing.\n\nPage content is only included when you attach it. You can change this anytime in Settings.

string.name: duck_chat_contextual_onboarding_primary
string.instruction: Button to continue to contextual Duck AI sheet

string.name: duck_chat_contextual_onboarding_secondary
string.instruction: Button to dismiss contextual Duck AI sheet
